mil3.4.4:1.2: “bhante nagasena, kena karanena manussa na sabbe samaka, anne appayuka, anne dighayuka, anne bahvabadha anne appabadha, anne dubbanna, anne vannavanto, anne appesakkha, anne mahesakkha, anne appabhoga, anne mahabhoga, anne nicakulina, anne mahakulina, anne duppanna, anne pannavanto”ti?
mil3.4.4:2.2: “kissa pana, maharaja, rukkha na sabbe samaka, anne ambila, anne lavana, anne tittaka, anne katuka, anne kasava, anne madhura”ti?
mil3.4.4:2.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, kammanam nanakaranena manussa na sabbe samaka, anne appayuka, anne dighayuka, anne bahvabadha, anne appabadha, anne dubbanna, anne vannavanto, anne appesakkha, anne mahesakkha, anne appabhoga, anne mahabhoga, anne nicakulina, anne mahakulina, anne duppanna, anne pannavanto.
mil3.4.4:2.6: ‘kammassaka, manava, satta kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammappatisarana, kammam satte vibhajati yadidam hinappanitataya’”ti.
